Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
The Jing Shengya Education System, an autonomous brand under Sichuan Jiafa Jing Shengya Education Technology Co., Ltd., a subsidiary of Jiafa Education, focuses on the research and development of big data platforms for college preference selection following the College Entrance Examination (CEE), career planning platform development, consulting services for career planning and college preference selection, training for consultants specializing in career planning and college preference selection, as well as winter and summer camp training programs for career planning. It provides online services for CEE college preference selection, subject choice guidance for new CEE reforms, career planning, comprehensive quality evaluation, and admission planning services such as the Strong Foundation Plan to over 9 million college entrance examinees each year.

Since 2016, Jing Shengya has cumulatively served more than 3 million examinees across the country, becoming an influential platform within the industry for career planning and college preference selection. After years of research and accumulation, Jing Shengya now covers 29 provinces and has nearly ten million registered users.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: I am a data preparer, primarily responsible for using Filecoin official tools such as Boost, Lotus, and Singularity to prepare and package data.At the beginning of the process, I receive raw data from clients or data providers, and then organize, verify, and deduplicate it to ensure its integrity and usability.Next, I use the Singularity tool to convert the raw data into a format suitable for storage on the Filecoin network, generating CAR (Content Addressable aRchive) files.CAR files serve as key carriers for on-chain data, containing not only the actual data but also the associated data fingerprint (Data CID), which facilitates verification and retrieval later on.After that, I perform further data sealing operations using Lotus, while leveraging Boost to improve data transfer efficiency, ensuring a smooth and stable process.Once the data is sealed, I compile all relevant information—including data size, CID, sector number, etc.—into a CSV form and submit it to the Storage Provider (SP).The SP can then import the CAR files via the CSV form and upload them to the Filecoin network for formal storage and proof submission.Throughout this process, I must also ensure that all data complies with Filecoin's technical specifications and storage standards to avoid upload failures caused by format issues.This series of steps makes up the core workflow of data preparation in the Filecoin network, forming a critical link between user data and decentralized storage infrastructure.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, Africa, North America, South America, Europe, Australia (continent), Antarctica
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives
